title: How to guarantee success in this life & the hereafter? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: i want to know how can i guarantee success both in this life and in the hereafter there are many ads in the quran which talk about success take for instance while every ayah in the quran talks about success or falah or najah it talks about general success in this life and the hereafter as well so just give us uh some you know tips if you want to be successful in this life and hereafter you have to submit your will to allah azzawajal you have to acknowledge that allah azzawajal is your creator he's the giver of life and he is the provider you have to trust rely and depend on allah azza and you have to follow the means that allah has created for you to take so you have to work you have to learn and above all you have to cleanse yourself inside and out so it's not how you look it's how you feel how you believe how you communicate with others and you need to surround yourself and this is extremely important in this day and era where we live with a good peer you need to have good companionship because if you're a lone wolf and you know that this is a bad terminology to use if you're a loner then shaytan is waiting for you is lurking in the dark for you to make a mistake but when you have your brothers in the islamic center in the masjid you hang out with them they follow really quran and sunnah and not a youtuber correct so we you have to have this once you have this environment and you start to learn your religion don't be a bowl people play with and toss it from one place to the other learn your religion learn your quran let the quran in your heart always on your mind always in your tongue remember allah learn know how to pray how to fast learn how to deal with your parents and with your neighbors and with your colleagues you my friend will be successful may allah
